channel.title: Is this allowed?
channel.description:
U all know slipknot scape I have made some changes at it
Bud it it allowed to upload that so peaple can download the changes?
Tell me please :)
I want that also other peaple can have what i have :)

item.title: Is this allowed?
item.dc:creator: @Mades Mades
item.description:
@Mades wrote:

Yes, this is allowed provided you add a credits. Then give a fair amount of credits to the people who helped made or supplied a server base. In other words it would look like this if I were to edit a Project Czar source.

Shift-Scape V1
Credits To:
Reforced for the base.
And Me for slightly editing.

You may also want to put “I am not taking 100% credits for this so it’s not leeching” or you will get flammed.
Hoped I helped.

Read full topic
